# input
N = int(input())
a_list = list(map(int, input().split()))

# initialization
a_list.sort()

# find the minimum distance
result = float('inf')
for i in range(1, N):
    result = min(result, a_list[i] - a_list[i-1])

# output
print(result)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a_list.sort()
    a_list.reverse()
    print(a_list)

    min_dist = a_list[0] - a_list[-1]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        min_dist += a_list[i] - a_list[i + 1]
    print(min_dist)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
